message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation of the precipitation reaction when calcium chloride (CaCl2) is mixed with sodium carbonate (Na2CO3)?
message_2:
When calcium chloride (CaCl2) is mixed with sodium carbonate (Na2CO3), a precipitation reaction occurs, forming calcium carbonate (CaCO3) and sodium chloride (NaCl). The balanced chemical equation for this reaction is:
